tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: (2/2) The letter continues: “The Spanish government make no difference between New Orleans and Boston, and pay no regard to…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (2/2) The letter continues: “The Spanish government make no difference between New Orleans and Boston, and pay no regard to the certificate of our authorities backed by their own consul… but send our vessels off without reason, much to our [economic] damage.” #FRUS #FSIatHome
